name: Snot City
description:
Quickly! The nasal spi­ders are com­ing in 10 min­utes and you have to find the 4 mys­ti­cal pig heads to stop them. There isn't much time Snot Boy, go now!

Arrow Keys or WASD to move,
Num­bers to cycle through mys­ti­cal pig heads, and you'll need the mouse too.

Fea­tured on GameJolt.com
Free Game Pick on Indi­eS­ta­tik
Reviewed on Creep­yGam­ing
Fea­tured on FreeIndieGames

Game 30 of 100 in 5 years
